snippet.title: KILLER IS DEAD - Nightmare Edition Trailer [UK]
snippet.description:
Get ready for the thrill of love and kill with this exclusive version of KILLER IS DEAD for PC!

KILLER IS DEAD -  Nightmare Edition is set for release on May 9th, 2014 and will come with the following:
• New difficulty mode called Nightmare Mode. In this mode, enemies can only be defeated using the following attacks: Adrenaline Burst, Dodge Burst, Headshots, so the gameplay tasking far more skill and tactics from you would-be executioners.
•  Theater Mode - Rewatch cutscenes and get extended background information on characters, helping to unravel the story after your 1st playthrough 
•  Smooth Operator Pack for console will be included and unlocked from the start, which includes X-ray glasses, bewitching outfits, stunning beauties, and a killer new mission and boss!
